AskNews piece allows you to search and r: AskNews piece allows you to search and retrieve enriched real-time and historical news articles using AskNews API.
To obtain your AskNews API key:

1. Visit [AskNews](https://asknews.app)
2. Sign up or log in to your account
3. Click on your profile and navigate to 'Settings' > 'API Credentials'
4. Generate a new API key
5. Copy and paste the key here
Search for enriched real-time news artic: Search for enriched real-time news articles from the past 48 hours or historical archive

Retrieve a single article or multiple ar: Retrieve a single article or multiple articles by their UUID(s)
Get chat completions from a news-infused: Get chat completions from a news-infused AI assistant powered by OpenAI API
Filter and search for top news narrative: Filter and search for top news narratives and story clusters
Create an automated newsletter powered b: Create an automated newsletter powered by news and AI
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint

Format of returned articles. \"string\": Format of returned articles. "string" is prompt-optimized, "dicts" is structured data, "both" returns both
